H0.text: Recycling the markers and reusing the milk cartons is the instruction line that best conserves the remaining resources in this phototropism experiment, where students grew bean plants in labeled cardboard milk cartons and then properly discarded the plants and soil.

H1.text: Reuse the markers, discard the milk cartons is the instruction line that best conserves the remaining resources in an experiment studying phototropism in which students grew bean plants in labeled cardboard milk cartons and subsequently discarded the plants and soil.

H2.text: Discarding the markers and reusing the milk cartons best conserves the remaining resources in an experiment studying phototropism where students grew bean plants in labeled cardboard milk cartons and then properly discarded the plants and soil.

H3.text: Reuse the markers, recycle the milk cartons is the instruction line that best conserves the remaining resources after students grow bean plants in labeled cardboard milk cartons for a phototropism experiment and properly discard the plants and soil.
